citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 A.M. on
20-Oct-16.
Called owner at work number when I arrived at facility. Owner was unable to leave work and there was no one at
the facility to conduct the inspection.
